explanation: To determine which services are generating the most errors, we can count the number of error logs categorized by service name. This will give us a clear picture of which services are encountering issues most frequently.
query: level == "ERROR" | summarize error_count = count() by resource.service.name | top 10 by error_count

widgets.query: level == "ERROR" | summarize error_count = count() by resource.service.name | top 10 by error_count
widgets.title: Top 10 Services by Error Count
